body: Hello guys, ive came here to discuss your favorite mods said in the topic above. In my opinion, I love all the staff. Examples would be the refs, officials. Im a ref and im so happy to work with those guys everyday! The whole staff is great! We have great administrators, Sr.Mods, mods, Jr.mods! We have a very great staff team that works to bring out maps which is really great and awesome. So in conclusion, I wanna give my full respect to the staff team!  Thanks!
body_tagged: Hello guys, ive came here to discuss your favorite mods said in the topic above. In my opinion, I love all the staff. Examples would be the refs, officials. We have a very great staff team that works to bring out maps which is really great and awesome. So in conclusion, I wanna give my full respect to the staff team!  Thanks!

Nah, but seriously, Michael/Straightened is my favourite. He hasn't false banned anyone so far (From what I know) and his way to deal with troubles is jut awesome.
